description: First floor side extension and installation of rooflights to house, retention of garden store and fence, with alterations to reduce height to 1.8m along the Gunnersbury Drive frontage
decision_conditions: The proposed side extension, by reason of siting, size and scale, would be visually overbearing and cause loss of outlook to the occupants of the residential property to the rear, no.91 Gunnersbury Avenue, harmful to their living conditions, contrary to Policies 4.1, 5.5, 5.9 of the Council's Adopted UDP "Plan for the Environment" 2004. | The proposed side extension and retention of garden store, in conjunction with the existing outbuilding, would in totality result in development that would be visually unattractive and out of character with the pattern of development in the locality, contrary to Policies 4.1, 5.5, 5.9 of the Council's Adopted UDP "Plan for the Environment" 2004.
